expl: Always On Display - a feature the latest phones have where the phone always has something displaying
What the phone was built with - listed as front (screen) / back. If there's no '/', this means the build is the same for front and back
Plastic that looks and feels like glass (Samsung product)
Identification (method of getting into your phone)
In the box - what comes in the box when the phone is delivered
Models are the phones in groupings. The Galaxy S23, S23+, and S23 Ultra are all Galaxy S23 models (or Galaxy S23s)
Optical Image Stabilization - Stabilizes your phone's camera while taking video so video is not as shaky
Time of flight depth sensor (for a camera)
